Literature.Title: The Natural Product Cyclomarin Kills Mycobacterium Tuberculosis by Targeting the ClpC1 Subunit of the Caseinolytic Protease

Literature.Title: Structural Basis of Mycobacterial Inhibition by Cyclomarin A
Literature.Author: Vasudevan D, Rao SPS, Noble C

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Bacillus subtilis(no activity data),Enterococcus faecalis(no activity data),Pseudomonas aeruginosa(no activity data),Staphylococcus aureus(no activity data),Mycobacterium smegmatis mc2-155(MIC50=0.6µM),Mycobacterium bovis BCG(MIC50=0.1µM),Mycobacterium tuberculosis H37Rv(MIC50=0.1µM),Mycobacterium tuberculosis H37Rv(MBC90=2.5µM)
